attributes.action: Cut the stleath tax on companys paying into their staffs pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the black hole this government  has created is forcing staff reductions. Causing people hardships in their retirement which in turn causes more strain on the government coffers and cuts investment.

rejection.details: It is not clear what tax you are referring to. Please clarify the action you are calling for in your petition title.
